p: Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes (KEGG) pathway analysis was performed in G1p and the G1d cells. As shown in Fig. 2B, with the threshold of q-value < 0.05, the differentially expressed genes observed in G1p and G1d cells from F1 follicles concentrate in the three pathways, including 15 genes associated with cell cycle (gga04110), 7 genes associated with DNA replication (gga03030) and 7 genes associated with steroid biosynthesis (gga00100) (Fig. 2B).
